# Extra Fancy

> Extra Fancy is a curated taste platform covering food, wine, travel, and design. Think a cooler, more approachable Monocle. Cultivated taste, not trending content. Taste over trend.

Extra Fancy is a media brand and newsletter focused on the things worth knowing: restaurants, wines, destinations, and design that reward attention. The editorial lens is opinionated and personal, not algorithmic.

## Main

- [Home](https://extrafancy.co/): Landing page and newsletter signup
- [Newsletter](https://letters.extrafancy.co/): The Extra Fancy newsletter on Beehiiv
- [Privacy Policy](https://extrafancy.co/privacy.html): Privacy and data practices

## Work

- [Work](https://extrafancy.co/work/): Selected projects and consulting work
